name: Token Design & Distribution
description: Fundamentals of token creation, utility models, and distribution strategies in blockchain ecosystems.

cards.title: Token Standards & Types
cards.description: Understanding different token standards and their applications.
cards.bulletpoints: ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155, fungible vs. non-fungible tokens
cards.summaryText: Compare ERC-20, ERC-721, and ERC-1155 capabilities while clarifying when fungible versus non-fungible tokens best serve a product vision.

cards.title: Token Utility & Governance
cards.description: Exploring how tokens function within ecosystems and enable governance.
cards.bulletpoints: Utility tokens, governance voting, staking incentives, security tokens
cards.summaryText: Explain how utility tokens power participation, how staking and voting reinforce governance, and when regulatory constraints push designs toward security tokens.

cards.title: Token Distribution Models
cards.description: Analyzing methods for fair and strategic token distribution.
cards.bulletpoints: Airdrops, ICOs, IDOs, liquidity mining, vesting schedules
cards.summaryText: Outline pros and cons of airdrops, sales, and liquidity mining while stressing vesting schedules that guard against dumping.
